transcript_chunks.text: while greg and jen were crying i get a message from nick scarpino on slack that says do you think it would make greg and jen feel better if you got a portillo tattoo to which i replied why not you though like why me and nick replies just the way it has to be 24 minutes before he met him before nick mentioned the tattoo there was another message that said i know the show is really sad but are we really not going to talk about tim's shirt i couldn't figure out how to work
